    • Method Detail

      • registerSpecies

        public boolean registerSpecies(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String scientificName,
                               SpeciesType type,
                               boolean hasFlowers,
                               boolean hasFruits,
                               double maxHeight)
        Registers a new flora species in the system.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the species.
        scientificName - The scientific name of the species.
        type - The type of the species (e.g., Flora).
        hasFlowers - Whether the species has flowers.
        hasFruits - Whether the species has fruits.
        maxHeight - The maximum height of the species.
        Returns:
        true if the species was successfully registered; false otherwise. Pre: The species array has an available slot. Pos: A new Species object is added to the array if there's space.

      • registerSpecies

        public boolean registerSpecies(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String scientificName,
                               SpeciesType type,
                               boolean isMigratory,
                               double maxWeight)
        Registers a new fauna species in the system.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the species.
        scientificName - The scientific name of the species.
        type - The type of the species (e.g., Fauna).
        isMigratory - Whether the species is migratory.
        maxWeight - The maximum weight of the species.
        Returns:
        true if the species was successfully registered; false otherwise. Pre: The species array has an available slot. Pos: A new Species object is added to the array if there's space.

      • showSpeciesList

        public java.lang.String showSpeciesList()
        Builds a list of all registered species names.
        Returns:
        A formatted string containing the names of all registered species. Pre: None. Pos: Returns a non-empty string if species are registered, otherwise an empty string.

      • buildSpeciesList

        public java.lang.String buildSpeciesList()
        Builds a detailed list of all registered species with their scientific names.
        Returns:
        A formatted string of all species names and their scientific names, or a message if none are registered. Pre: None. Pos: Returns a list of species or a message if no species are found.

      • findSpeciesByName

        public Species findSpeciesByName(java.lang.String speciesNameToEdit)
        Finds a species by its name.
        Parameters:
        speciesNameToEdit - The name of the species to search for.
        Returns:
        The Species object if found; null otherwise. Pre: None. Pos: Returns the species with the specified name, if it exists.

      • updateSpecies

        public void updateSpecies(Species updatedSpecies)
        Updates an existing species with new attributes.
        Parameters:
        updatedSpecies - The Species object containing updated information. Pre: Species with the same name exists in the array. Pos: Species attributes are updated based on the provided Species object.

      • removeSpecies

        public boolean removeSpecies(Species speciesToDelete)
        Removes a species from the system.
        Parameters:
        speciesToDelete - The species to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if the species was successfully removed; false otherwise. Pre: Species exists in the array. Pos: Species is removed if it exists.
